Typealiases.html#/s:14IndoorLocation6Anc.name: Anchor
Typealiases.html#/s:14IndoorLocation6Anc.abstract: Structure of an anchor having an id, a position and a flag indicating whether it is currently within range.

Protocols/IndoorLocationManagerDelegate..name: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate
Protocols/IndoorLocationManagerDelegate..abstract: A protocol to be implemented by a ViewController. It informs the delegate about updates for the GUI.

Functions.html#/s:14IndoorLocation25comp.name: computeNormalDistribution(x:m:forTriangularCovariance:withInverse:)
Functions.html#/s:14IndoorLocation25comp.abstract: Computes the value of p(x) where p(x) = N(x, m, P) in a logarithmic scale.

Functions.html#/s:14IndoorLocation14aler.name: alertWithTitle(_:message:actions:)
Functions.html#/s:14IndoorLocation14aler.abstract: Present an alert from any point in the code.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa14IndoorLocat.name: randomGaussianVector(mean:A:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa14IndoorLocat.abstract: Generate a random gaussian distributed vector with specified mean and covariance.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa14IndoorLocat.name: computeEigenvalueDecomposition()
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa14IndoorLocat.abstract: Computes the eigenvalue decomposition of a matrix.

Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.name: random()
Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.abstract: Generate a random sample from a uniform distribution in the range [0, 1].

Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.name: random(upperBound:)
Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.abstract: Generate a random sample from a uniform distribution in the range [0, upperBound].

Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.name: randomGaussian()
Extensions/Float.html#/s:Sf14IndoorLocat.abstract: Generate a random sample from a standard normal distribution.

Enums/ParticleFilterType.html#/s:14Indoo.name: bootstrap
Enums/ParticleFilterType.html#/s:14Indoo.abstract: Bootstrap filter. Plain SIR algorithm is executed

Enums/FilterType.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.name: none
Enums/FilterType.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.abstract: No filter. A linear least squares algorithm will be executed

Enums/FilterType.html.name: FilterType
Enums/FilterType.html.abstract: The type of filter that is used.

Enums/ParticleFilterType.html.name: ParticleFilterType
Enums/ParticleFilterType.html.abstract: The type of particle filter that is used

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: F
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: Process matrix F representing the physical model:

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: G
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: G is the factorization of the covariance matrix for the process noise Q

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: Q
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: Q is the covariance matrix for the process noise

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: R
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: R is the covariance matrix for the measurement noise. It is a numAnchors x numAnchors

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: u
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: The acceleration measurement of the previous time step as control input

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: executeAlgorithm(anchors:distances:acceleration:successCallback:)
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: Execute the algorithm of the filter to determine the agent’s position.

Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: didChangeAnchors(_:)
Classes/BayesianFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: A function to update the set of active anchors. The new matrix R along with its inverse is determined.

Classes/SliderTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.name: setupWithValue(_:minValue:maxValue:text:unit:delegate:tag:)
Classes/SliderTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.abstract: Sets up the cell with the provided data

Classes/SliderTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.name: onSliderValueChanged(_:)
Classes/SliderTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Function that is called when the value of the slider changes. The delegate is informed about this event.

Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.name: updateState(u:)
Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.abstract: Update state by drawing a value from the importance density of the particle.

Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.name: updateWeight(anchors:measurements:)
Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.abstract: Update the particle’s weight according to the measurement

Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.name: regularize(D:)
Classes/Particle.html#/s:14IndoorLocatio.abstract: Regularize the particle. The particle’s state vector is jittered with some noise according to matrix D.

Classes/NetworkManager.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: networkTask(task:data:resultCallback:)
Classes/NetworkManager.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: This function is used to send tasks to the Arduino.

Classes/SwitchTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.name: setupWithText(_:isOn:delegate:tag:)
Classes/SwitchTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.abstract: Sets up the cell with the provided data

Classes/SwitchTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.name: onSwitchTapped(_:)
Classes/SwitchTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Function that is called when the switch is tapped. The delegate is informed about this event.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onAddAnchorButtonTapped(_:id:x:y:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: AnchorTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when a new anchor has to be added.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onRemoveAnchorButtonTapped(_:id:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: AnchorTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when an anchor has to be removed.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: ButtonTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when the button of a ButtonTableViewCell is tapped.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onSegmentedControlValueChanged(_:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: SegmentedControlTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when the value of the segmented control of a SegmentedControlTableViewCell

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onSliderValueChanged(_:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: SliderTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when the value of the slider of a SliderTableViewCell is changed.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: onSwitchTapped(_:)
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: SwitchTableViewCellDelegate function that is called when the switch of a SwitchTableViewCell is tapped.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: dismissKeyboard()
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: Function to dismiss the keyboard if tapped outside of a UITextField

Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.name: setupWithSegments(_:selectedSegmentIndex:delegate:tag:)
Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.abstract: Sets up the cell with the provided data

Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.name: onSegmentedControlValueChanged(_:)
Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.abstract: Function that is called when the value of the segmented control changes. The delegate is informed about this event.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: handleRotation(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when a rotating gesture is recognized in the mapView. The view is rotated accordingly.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: handlePinch(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when a pinch gesture is recognized in the mapView. The view is zoomed accordingly.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: handlePan(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when a pan gesture is recognized in the mapView. The view is translated accordingly.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: draggedAnchor(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when an anchor is dragged by the user. This initiates calibration from view.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: didTapCalibrationButton(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when then calibration button is tapped. The new array of anchors and their positions is passed to the delegate.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.name: didTapCancelCalibrationButton(_:)
Classes/IndoorMapView.html#/c:@M@IndoorL.abstract: Function that is called when the cancel calibration button is tapped. The view is restored to the previous state.

Classes/EllipseView.html#/s:14IndoorLoca.name: updateEllipse(withEllipseType:position:)
Classes/EllipseView.html#/s:14IndoorLoca.abstract: Updates the shape and position of the ellipse.

Classes/ExtendedKalmanFilter.html#/s:14I.name: P
Classes/ExtendedKalmanFilter.html#/s:14I.abstract: P is the covariance matrix for the state

Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.name: setupWithDelegate(_:anchor:)
Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.abstract: Sets up the cell with the provided data

Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.name: onAddAnchorButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Function that is called when the plus button of the cell is tapped. The entered data is forwarded to the delegate.

Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.name: onRemoveAnchorButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Function that is called when the trash button of the cell is tapped. The ID of the cell is forwarded to the delegate.

Classes/ParticleFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: h_opt
Classes/ParticleFilter.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: The optimal bandwith for the regularization step

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: calibrate(resultCallback:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: A function to perform calibration. The calibration data is sent to the Arduino and the response is processed accordingly.

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: beginRanging(resultCallback:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: Function used to begin ranging on the Arduino.

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: stopRanging(resultCallback:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: Function used to stop ranging on the Arduino.

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: newRangingData(_:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: A function that is called by the NetworkManager when new measurement data from the Arduino is available. This function

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: addAnchorWithID(_:x:y:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: Function to add an anchor with specified parameters.

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.name: removeAnchorWithID(_:)
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html#/s:14.abstract: Removes the anchor with the specified ID.

Classes/VectorView.html#/c:@M@IndoorLoca.name: updateVector(withOrigin:vector:)
Classes/VectorView.html#/c:@M@IndoorLoca.abstract: Updates the origin, direction and length of the vector.

Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: processUncertainty
Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: This models the uncertainty of the applied physical model. As the acceleration within one time step is not constant, the physical model is

Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: distanceUncertainty
Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: This models the uncertainty of the distance measurements. Its unit is in cm^2.

Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: N_thr
Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: The effective sample size. The larger it is chosen, the more frequently resampling is executed.

Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.name: updateTime
Classes/FilterSettings.html#/s:14IndoorL.abstract: The update time is necessary for the filters. It cannot be changed unless the frequency for measurements on the Arduino is changed as well.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: updatePosition(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate function that is called when a new position is available

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.name: setAnchors(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.abstract: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate function that is called after new anchors have been calibrated.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.name: updateActiveAnchors(_:distances:acceleration:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.abstract: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate function that is called when the set of active anchors has changed or new measurements are available.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: updateCovariance(eigenvalue1:eigenvalue2:angle:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate function that is called when a new covariance for the Kalman filter is available.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.name: updateParticles(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.abstract: IndoorLocationManagerDelegate function that is called when a new state for all particles is available.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: toggleFloorplanVisible(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: SettingsTableViewControllerDelegate function that is called when the settings for displaying the floorplan have changed.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: toggleMeasurementsVisible(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: SettingsTableViewControllerDelegate function that is called when the settings for displaying the measurements have changed.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.name: changeFilterType(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.abstract: SettingsTableViewControllerDelegate function that is called when the settings for the filterType have changed.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.name: didDoCalibrationFromView(newAnchors:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/s:14Indo.abstract: IndoorMapViewDelegate function that is called when calibration from view is requested by the user.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: onSettingsButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: Function that is called when the settings button is tapped. It presents the SettingsViewController as popover.

Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.name: onStartButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/MapViewController.html#/c:@M@Ind.abstract: Function that is called when the start button is tapped. It begins and stops ranging and changes its image accordingly.

Classes/TrajectoryView.html#/c:@M@Indoor.name: updateTrajectory(_:)
Classes/TrajectoryView.html#/c:@M@Indoor.abstract: Redraws the trajectory with a new array of positions.

Classes/ButtonTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.name: setupWithText(_:delegate:)
Classes/ButtonTableViewCell.html#/s:14In.abstract: Sets up the cell with the provided data

Classes/ButtonTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.name: onButtonTapped(_:)
Classes/ButtonTableViewCell.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Function that is called when the button is tapped. The delegate is informed about this event.

Classes/FilterSettings.html.name: FilterSettings
Classes/FilterSettings.html.abstract: Class to store the settings for both the view and the active filter.

Classes/VectorView.html.name: VectorView
Classes/VectorView.html.abstract: View that displays simple vectors in x and y directions. It is used to display the current acceleration vectors in x and y direction.

Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html.name: IndoorLocationManager
Classes/IndoorLocationManager.html.abstract: Class for managing positioning. It interacts with the NetworkManager and the ViewControllers to perform all essential tasks.

Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html.name: AnchorTableViewCell
Classes/AnchorTableViewCell.html.abstract: A cell that displays data of an anchor. Its ID and coordinates are displayed. Empty cells can be edited.

Classes/ExtendedKalmanFilter.html.name: ExtendedKalmanFilter
Classes/ExtendedKalmanFilter.html.abstract: Class that implements an Extended Kalman filter.

Classes/EllipseView.html.name: EllipseView
Classes/EllipseView.html.abstract: View that displays an ellipse. This can be the measured distances of an anchor or the covariance of the Kalman filter.

Classes/IndoorMapView.html.name: IndoorMapView
Classes/IndoorMapView.html.abstract: This class manages the display of the indoor positioning system.

Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.name: SegmentedControlTableViewCell
Classes/SegmentedControlTableViewCell.ht.abstract: A cell that contains a segmented control.

Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.name: SettingsTableViewController
Classes/SettingsTableViewController.html.abstract: ViewController for the settings of the application

Classes/NetworkManager.html.name: NetworkManager
Classes/NetworkManager.html.abstract: Class to handle communication with the Arduino. It automatically determines the Arduino’s IP address using Bonjour, sets up a server on the iOS device

Classes/BayesianFilter.html.name: BayesianFilter
Classes/BayesianFilter.html.abstract: Class to implement a Bayesian filter. Without subclassing, no filter is applied and therefore a linear least squares algorithm is executed.

Classes/PointView.html.name: PointView
Classes/PointView.html.abstract: View that displays a point. This can be the position of the agent, the anchors or the particles.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
